projects.title: AI-Powered Advertising
projects.subtitle: Cinematic Ads That Convert
projects.description: Next-level advertising where AI efficiency meets human creativity. Delivering cinematic, high-converting ad content at unprecedented speed.
projects.challenge: Traditional video production is expensive and time-consuming. Clients need high-quality ads fast without compromising creativity.
projects.solution: We harmonized AI-powered video generation with human creative direction. AI handles the heavy lifting while our team ensures emotional resonance and brand alignment.
projects.result: Delivering broadcast-quality ads in days instead of weeks. Our clients see higher engagement rates while spending 70% less on production costs.

projects.title: Lightning-Fast Websites
projects.subtitle: Code to Production in Record Time
projects.description: Enterprise-grade websites built with Next.js and AI integrations. From concept to live deployment faster than traditional development.
projects.challenge: Businesses need modern, fast websites that work flawlessly across devices. Traditional development takes months and costs a fortune.
projects.solution: We leverage Next.js for optimal performance and AI-assisted development for rapid iteration. Every site is SEO-optimized, mobile-first, and blazing fast.
projects.result: Launched yaksen.cloud, sanda.work, and westernjewellers.shop - all loading in under 2 seconds with perfect mobile scores.

projects.title: Unforgettable Branding
projects.subtitle: Logos That Stick in Memory
projects.description: Memorable logo designs that capture brand essence. Each mark is crafted to be instantly recognizable and timeless.
projects.challenge: Creating logos that stand out in crowded markets while remaining simple and memorable.
projects.solution: We explore 100+ AI-generated variations, then refine the best concepts with human expertise. The result: logos that work at any size, in any context.
projects.result: Delivered iconic brand identities for 25+ businesses across Sri Lanka. Each logo tells a story and builds instant recognition.

projects.title: IN HUMAN <+>
projects.subtitle: Music + AI Revolution
projects.description: Experimental music project pushing creative boundaries using AI-driven music composition.
projects.challenge: Music Production is expensive. We wanted to create a new musical wave using AI.
projects.solution: We used AI tools from Melody to Mastering. But the emotion was ours. A place where human feelings and AI Logic met.
projects.result: Through this project, we are researching a new Music Genre. We have received good responses on YouTube and Spotify.

projects.title: Yakira
projects.subtitle: Sri Lanka's First AI Fashion Model
projects.description: AI-generated virtual influencer showing Sri Lankan elegance and fashion.
projects.challenge: To create a character with a Sri Lankan look while reducing the high cost of Influencer Marketing.
projects.solution: We created 'Yakira'. Although she is 100% Digital, her look and behavior are truly Sri Lankan. Now photoshoots are not needed to promote clothes.
projects.result: Yakira is now working as Sri Lanka's first AI Fashion Influencer. Brands can promote their clothes through her without any photoshoot costs.

projects.title: Frulora
projects.subtitle: Global Branding for Local Food
projects.description: Premium dehydrated food brand built with AI-enhanced branding and design workflow.
projects.challenge: To give a premium look to local Dehydrated food to reach the international market.
projects.solution: Using AI, we created 100+ Packaging Designs. We chose the best one and turned Frulora into a World-Class Brand.
projects.result: Frulora is now an Export-ready brand. Their Product line (Fruit Powders, Slices) now looks like a world-class Brand.

projects.title: Sakya Route
projects.subtitle: Operations Made Simple
projects.description: Software solution for scheduling, permissions, and real-time visitor check-ins.
projects.challenge: Difficulty in managing field Sales teams and Visitors.
projects.solution: We built a Smart App. You can see who is coming, what time, and where they are in Real-time. Saves fuel and time.
projects.result: Several organizations are now using this System. Their Field Operations are 100% Digital. Time and fuel costs have been reduced significantly.
